tool_description: Records and tracks actual income transactions against budgeted amounts, providing real-time income monitoring with source attribution and variance tracking.

action.description: Action to perform: add, update, delete, or query

transaction_date.description: Date of income transaction in ISO 8601 format

income_source_id.description: ID of the income source for this transaction

description.description: Optional description or notes for the transaction

transaction_id.description: Unique identifier for existing transaction (required for update/delete)

start_date.description: Start date for query range in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: End date for query range in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid action: Use one of [add, update, delete, query].
Missing required fields: For add action, transaction_date, income_source_id, and amount are required.
Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 format for all date fields.
Invalid amount: Amount must be a positive number.
Transaction not found: The specified transaction_id does not exist.
Income source not found: The specified income_source_id does not exist.
Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date for query action.
usage: Specify action and provide required parameters. For add, include transaction details. For update/delete, provide transaction_id. For query, optionally specify date range.

transaction_count.description: Number of transactions processed or found

total_income.description: Total income amount for the period or query

budget_variance.description: Variance between actual and budgeted income
